##RRUFFID=R130040
##IDEAL CHEMISTRY=Ca_3_Ca_1.5_Al_2_(S^6+^O_4_)F_13_&#183;12H_2_O
##LOCALITY=Val Cavallizza Pb–Zn–Ag mine, Cuasso al Monte, Varese province, Italy
##OWNER=Frederic Hatert
##SOURCE=Frederic Hatert
##DESCRIPTION=Crystals translucent to transparent, colourless to white,with a white streak and a vitreous lustre. Associated with marcasite, gypsum, and hydrated Fe oxides. Data from Vignola et al (2012) 
##STATUS=The identification of this mineral has been confirmed by X-ray diffraction and chemical analysis
##URL=rruff.info/R130040
